posts.post_title: FS: t206 Johnson, Cobb and Young
posts.post_content:
Following are for sale:

check or MO please, any questions on the scans please e-mail, no PMs, I know my scanning is not ideal.

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]


Cobb, red - SGC 55 - $1,950  sharp corners, slight diamond cut
Johnson,port - SGC 50 - $1,460 very solid card
Johnson, throw, sov back - SGC 60 - $2,350
Young, SGC 55 - SOLD
